analysis.key_quote: I do not want any president, whether I voted for them or not, to be able to remove vast swathes of the civil service and replace them with people whose primary allegiance is to that president.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by expressing concerns about politicization of the civil service and the loss of institutional knowledge, emphasizing the need for continuity and allegiance to the Constitution rather than to political figures.
